companyInfo.name: AADI ENTERPRISES
companyInfo.tagline: Premium & Essential Collections for Modern Hospitality

introduction.title: Enhancing Guest Comfort, One Detail at a time
introduction.description: Aadi Enterprises delivers a complete range of Housekeeping and In-Room Amenity Solutions designed for efficiency, elegance, and long-lasting performance — empowering hotels and resorts to craft unforgettable guest experiences.
imageDescriptions: Page 1: Two housekeeping staff members in uniform making a hotel bed.
Page 1: A stack of folded towels (white, beige, grey) next to green soap/lotion dispensers on a marble surface.
Page 2: Polaroid-style photos showing cleaning supplies in a bucket and a collection of hotel bathroom amenities (soaps, brushes, etc.).
Page 2: A full view of a modern, well-appointed hotel room with a neatly made bed and city view.

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.subtitle: Where Function Meets Luxury
points: Tailored solutions for all property categories – from budget to luxury.
Focus on durability, hygiene, and design aesthetics.
Supported by after-sales service and expert consultation.
imageDescriptions: An image of a luxury resort with palm trees and a tiled roof.
A large hotel building with a curved facade next to a swimming pool.

productSegmentsOverview.title: Product Segments Overview
productSegmentsOverview.subtitle: TWO CURATED RANGES TO SUIT EVERY NEED
imageDescriptions: A guest couple checking in at a hotel reception desk.
Breakfast tray being served on a neatly made hotel bed.
A female housekeeper carrying a basket of cleaning supplies.

productCategories.title: Commercial Kitchen
productCategories.description: Curated equipment from the world's finest brands, tailored for Hotels, Restaurants, and Institutional Catering.

brands.name: Rational Combi Oven
brands.headline: The Ultimate Combination of Precision, Power & Performance.
brands.description: The Rational Combi Oven is the industry benchmark for modern commercial kitchens—trusted by chefs in 5-star hotels, QSR chains, cloud kitchens, and high-volume production units. Designed for maximum output with minimal labour, Rational delivers consistent cooking results every single time.
brands.subDescription: Rational's intelligent cooking technology eliminates guesswork by automatically adjusting temperature, humidity, airflow, and cook time to match the food's needs. Whether you're grilling, baking, steaming, roasting, frying, or regenerating—Rational ensures: Uniform cooking across all trays, Significant energy savings, Reduced food waste, Higher yield & improved taste, Maximum safety & hygiene.
features: iCombi Pro - Smart Cooking System - automatically senses load size & adjusts settings
SelfCookingCenter - handles over 90% of common menu items
Efficient LevelControl - cook multiple dishes simultaneously without flavour transfer
Ultra-Fast Cleaning - self-cleaning mode with minimal chemical use
Low Operational Cost - optimized heat transfer & steam management
brands.closing: If your kitchen demands speed, consistency, and premium results, Rational is the clear choice.

brands.name: Winterhalter Commercial Dishwashers
brands.headline: Hygiene You Can Trust. Performance You Can Measure.
brands.description: Winterhalter dishwashers are engineered for hospitality businesses that cannot compromise on cleanliness, speed, or reliability. Recognized globally for their precision German engineering, Winterhalter machines ensure spotless, hygienic, and streak-free wash results—every cycle, every load.
brands.subDescription: Why Winterhalter Leads the Market: Winterhalter combines smart wash technology with water, detergent, and energy optimization—giving you unmatched operational efficiency.
features: VarioPower Pressure Control - adjusts pressure based on dish type
Thermostop Technology - guarantees perfect sanitization temperatures
Efficient Filtration System - ensures crystal-clear wash water
Low Chemical Consumption - reduces running cost
Rapid Wash Cycles - faster table turnaround
Noise-Reduced Operation - ideal for open kitchens & F&B service areas

extraInfo.Guaranteed Hygiene: Certified to international hygiene standards, Winterhalter ensures 100% sanitization for hotels, restaurants, hospitals, and food production units.

brands.closing: Winterhalter delivers consistent hygiene, lower operating costs, and long-term reliability—a must-have for every modern kitchen.

brands.name: Robot Coupe Food Preparation Equipment
brands.headline: Speed, Precision & Reliability for Every Prep Task.
brands.description: A global pioneer in food preparation solutions, Robot Coupe is the backbone of efficient commercial kitchens. Designed to save time, reduce labor, and deliver consistent results, Robot Coupe machines streamline all pre-prep operations with unmatched accuracy.
brands.subDescription: Why Robot Coupe? Robot Coupe equipment is engineered for high-volume kitchens and offers exceptional durability, cutting power, and precision across a wide variety of tasks.
features: Vegetable Preparation - slicing, dicing, julienning, shredding
Chopping & Emulsifying - consistent texture for any recipe
High-Speed Performance - processes large volumes in seconds
advantages: Razor-sharp stainless-steel blades for consistent cuts
Heavy-duty motors designed for continuous operation
Time-saving output ideal for peak hours
brands.closing: Robot Coupe transforms your pre-preparation workflow—making it faster, more efficient, and more accurate.

brands.name: 100% Chef - Avant-Garde Culinary Tools
brands.description: 100% Chef is a global leader in innovative culinary tools, molecular gastronomy equipment, and high-end presentationware. Designed for professional chefs, the brand revolutionizes plating, food styling, and modern gastronomy.
features: Smoke domes, pipettes, liquid nitrogen accessories
Preferred by fine dining & Michelin-star restaurants
brands.closing: Chefs choose 100% Chef to bring creativity, theatre, and precision to their dishes—perfect for tasting menus and signature presentations.

brands.name: Atlantic Chef - Professional Chef Knives
brands.description: Atlantic Chef delivers premium chef knives and professional kitchen tools engineered for accuracy, balance, and long-lasting sharpness. Built from high-grade stainless steel, these knives support daily use in commercial kitchens.
features: Range includes chef knives, butcher tools, peelers & kitchen accessories
Extreme edge retention for professional usage

productCategories.title: F&B Service
productCategories.description: Elevating the Art of Dining & Service.

brands.name: Ariane Porcelain
brands.headline: Crafted for Culinary Presentation Excellence
brands.description: Ariane is one of the most trusted names in premium vitrified porcelain, designed specifically for the demanding world of hospitality. At Aadi Enterprises, we supply the complete range of Ariane tableware—engineered to withstand heavy use while elevating food presentation to a fine-dining standard.
features: Fully Vitrified Body - Strong, chip-resistant & built for commercial use
High Thermal Shock Resistance - Works seamlessly from oven to table
Lead-Free, Non-Porous Surface - Safe and hygienic for professional kitchens
Modern, Minimalist Designs - Enhances plating aesthetics
brands.closing: Ariane porcelain isn't just tableware—it's a canvas for culinary artistry.

brands.name: Schott Zwiesel
brands.headline: German Glass Engineering at its Finest
brands.description: Schott Zwiesel is globally recognized for producing the most durable, brilliant, and elegant glassware using TRITAN® crystal technology. As an authorized supplier, Aadi Enterprises offers the complete range—from wine glasses to barware—to meet the highest standards in hospitality.
features: TRITAN® Crystal Technology - Break-resistant, lead-free, and ultra-clear
Superior Brilliance & Shine - Retains clarity even after 1,000+ washes
Perfect Balance & Feel - Designed for sommeliers and mixologists
brands.closing: Schott Zwiesel isn't just glassware—it's a statement of luxury and performance.

brands.name: Studio William
brands.headline: Fine-Dining Cutlery with British Craftsmanship
brands.description: Studio William is globally known for its award-winning cutlery, crafted with precision and designed to complement the luxury dining experience. Aadi Enterprises brings this iconic brand to India's finest hotels and restaurants.
features: Premium 18/10 Stainless Steel - Exceptional shine, corrosion-resistant
Designer Aesthetics - Unique silhouettes that enhance table presentation
Perfect Weight & Balance - Enhances guest comfort and dining experience
Fine-Dining Collection Range - Suitable for luxury properties

Popular Collections: Steak Knives, Serving Tools & Specialty Pieces

brands.closing: Studio William is more than cutlery—it's a refinement of the dining ritual.

brands.name: Utopia Tableware
brands.headline: Premium Crockery for Modern Hospitality
brands.description: Utopia is one of the world's most trusted names in hotel crockery, offering a perfect balance of durability, elegance, and functionality. Designed for restaurants, hotels, cafes, banquets, and luxury dining environments, Utopia's crockery collection is engineered to withstand high-volume usage without compromising aesthetics.
features: Wide range for buffet, fine dine, bar & banquet service
Ideal for high-heat environments and dishwashers

brands.name: Steelite
brands.headline: World-Class Ceramics for Professional Chefs
brands.description: Steelite is renowned worldwide for its high-performance vitrified tableware used by leading hotels, Michelin-star restaurants, and global F&B chains. Manufactured in the UK, Steelite products deliver unmatched longevity with contemporary style.
brands.closing: Perfect for premium dining, buffet presentation, and high-turnover service where longevity is essential.

brands.name: Serax
brands.headline: Designer Hospitality Tableware from Belgium
brands.description: Serax brings luxury, artistry, and modern European design into professional dining spaces. Their collections—developed with world-famous designers—are ideal for hotels that want a distinctive, signature dining identity.
features: Unique shapes and textures for chef plating
Used globally by top fine-dine restaurants
Perfect blend of form and function

brands.name: LSA International
brands.headline: Modern Handcrafted Glass & Tableware
brands.description: LSA International is globally loved for its handmade mouth-blown glassware and minimalist tableware. Their products bring a sophisticated European aesthetic to hotel rooms, bars, and restaurant spaces.
features: Suitable for luxury hotels, lounges & bars

brands.name: Pasabahce
brands.headline: High-Durability, Value-Driven Glassware
brands.description: Pasabahce (Turkey) is one of the world's largest glassware manufacturers, offering a reliable and affordable range of toughened hotel glassware ideal for heavy commercial usage.
features: Suitable for restaurants, bars & banquet halls
Large range: water glasses, wine glasses, beer mugs, jars, bowls

brands.name: NUDE Glassware
brands.headline: Contemporary Crystalware from Turkey
brands.description: NUDE is globally recognized for its lead-free crystal glassware crafted with exceptional clarity and minimalist European aesthetics. Designed in Istanbul, NUDE collections are loved by premium hotels, bars, and Michelin-star restaurants for their elegance and durability.
features: Wide range: wine glasses, cocktail glasses, decanters, barware
brands.closing: Its refined silhouettes and premium finish elevate any bar or dining experience while remaining durable for high-volume hospitality service.

brands.name: M.Style
brands.headline: Japanese Craftsmanship in Tableware
brands.description: M.Style brings the essence of authentic Japanese design into modern hospitality. Known for its beautiful glazes, handcrafted textures, and timeless shapes, M.Style collections offer the perfect canvas for Asian and fusion cuisine.
features: Perfect for sushi, ramen, dim-sum & fine-dine plating
Unique glazes, stoneware textures & handcrafted finishes
A favourite among pan-Asian restaurants & boutique hotels

brands.name: Figgjo
brands.headline: Premium Porcelain from Norway
brands.description: Figgjo is Norway's iconic porcelain manufacturer known for its superior durability, clean Scandinavian design, and professional-grade performance. Its products are widely used in luxury hotels and innovative chef-driven kitchens across the world.
features: Ideal for high-temperature and high-usage environments
Designed in collaboration with leading chefs

brands.name: ArtEvo
brands.headline: Contemporary Designer Tableware for Modern Hospitality
brands.description: ArtEvo specializes in stylish, modern, and design-forward tableware made for professional hospitality environments. With unique textures, artistic finishes, and bold silhouettes, ArtEvo helps restaurants create a signature presentation aesthetic.
features: Perfect for chefs who value creativity in plating

brands.name: Luigi Bormioli
brands.headline: Fine Italian Crystal Glassware
brands.description: Luigi Bormioli is globally renowned for its Italian-designed crystal glassware, offering unmatched clarity, elegance, and durability. Made with SON.hyx® crystal technology, these glasses are perfect for premium hotel bars, lounges, and fine-dining restaurants.
features: Elegant silhouettes for wine, cocktails & spirits

brands.name: T&G
brands.headline: Stylish Tableware, Boards & Serveware
brands.description: T&G is a leading global brand known for high-quality serveware, wooden boards, table accessories, and kitchen essentials crafted with sustainable materials. Their collections enhance presentation while supporting durability needed in hospitality environments.
features: Premium wooden boards, mills, and table accessories
Perfect for buffet, bakery, grill & casual dining concepts
Designed for both functionality and style

brands.name: Shapes
brands.headline: Contemporary Tableware for Modern Dining
brands.description: Shapes is known for its stylish, functional and durable tableware crafted for hotels, restaurants, and banquets. With collections spanning porcelain, stoneware, melamine, and premium serveware, Shapes blends value with contemporary design.
features: Wide range of patterns, colours & textures
Perfect for buffets, banquets, cafés & casual dining

brands.name: Bar Kraft
brands.headline: Professional Bar Tools & Mixology Essentials
brands.description: Bar Kraft offers a complete range of premium bar accessories and mixology tools designed for professional bartenders. Known for durability and modern aesthetics, Bar Kraft products enhance efficiency and elevate the bar experience.
features: Stainless-steel shakers, strainers, jiggers & bar sets
Ideal for cocktails, mixology & beverage programs

brands.name: Kaapi Solutions
brands.headline: Professional Coffee Equipment for Hotels & Cafés
brands.description: Kaapi Solutions is one of India's leading providers of premium coffee machines, grinders, and barista equipment, offering solutions for hotels, cafés, bakeries, and corporate spaces. Their range supports both speciality coffee and high-volume operations.
features: Imported espresso machines from leading global brands
brands.closing: Reliable, high-performance machines ideal for breakfast lounges, room service, fine dine restaurants, and lobby cafés.

brands.name: Cothas Coffee
brands.headline: Authentic Filter Coffee for Hotels & Cafés
brands.description: Cothas Coffee is one of India's most respected names in South Indian filter coffee, trusted by hotels, restaurants, cafés, and corporate establishments for its rich aroma and consistent taste. Made from premium hand-picked beans, Cothas delivers a bold, smooth, and authentic brew experience.
features: Strong aroma and deep flavour profile
Perfect for buffet breakfast & in-room dining

brands.name: Karcher
brands.headline: German Cleaning Technology
brands.description: A global leader in professional cleaning systems, Karcher offers high-performance machines built for intensive hospitality use.

brands.name: IPC
brands.headline: Professional Cleaning Systems
brands.description: IPC (Integrated Professional Cleaning) delivers reliable and efficient cleaning equipment suited for continuous commercial operations.

brands.name: Housekeeping & Utility Trolleys
brands.description: (Compatible with Karcher, IPC, and leading FM vendors)

brands.name: Waste Management Solutions
brands.description: We offer complete waste systems for hospitality & facilities.

brands.name: Dolphy
brands.headline: Premium Hotel Amenities & Hygiene Equipment
brands.description: Dolphy offers a complete range of hotel amenities, hygiene products, and washroom automation solutions designed for modern hospitality environments. From automatic dispensers to guestroom equipment, Dolphy supports comfort and cleanliness across property operations.
features: Hand dryers, hair dryers, air fresheners
Designed for durability and heavy hotel traffic

brands.name: Euronics
brands.headline: Smart Hygiene & Washroom Automation Solutions
brands.description: Euronics is one of India's leading brands in automated washroom solutions, offering touchless hygiene products ideal for hotels, malls, airports, and premium facilities. Known for reliability and innovation, Euronics products enhance hygiene and guest experience.
features: Touchless taps, soap dispensers, hand dryers
Perfect for luxury washrooms & high-traffic areas

brands.name: Vikan
brands.headline: World-Class Hygienic Cleaning Tools
brands.description: Vikan is globally recognized for manufacturing the most hygienic, durable, and ergonomic cleaning tools for professional environments. Designed in Denmark, Vikan products are trusted by leading hotels, hospitals, and food facilities that demand the highest standards of cleanliness and safety.
features: Food-Grade Materials - Safe for F&B areas
Ergonomic Design - Lightweight tools reduce staff fatigue

brands.name: Vileda Professional
brands.headline: Advanced Cleaning Solutions for Hospitality
brands.description: Vileda Professional is a global leader in microfibre cleaning technology, offering advanced and efficient tools designed for the hospitality and facility management sector. Their products are engineered to deliver maximum hygiene with minimum effort, reducing operational costs and improving cleaning efficiency.
features: Superior Microfibre Technology - Removes 99%+ bacteria with just water
Lightweight & Ergonomic Tools - Designed for housekeeping speed and safety
High Durability - Long lifespan, ideal for heavy hotel usage
Chemical Savings - Lower detergent usage with high-absorption microfibres

Products We Supply: Sweeping systems and dust control solutions

brands.name: Saraya / Mystair
brands.headline: Complete Hand Hygiene & Disinfection Solutions
brands.description: Saraya and Mystair are trusted names in professional hygiene technology, offering advanced solutions for washrooms, kitchens, housekeeping areas, and guest touchpoints. With automatic dispensers, premium formulations, and reliable equipment, they help hotels maintain world-class hygiene standards.

brands.name: Commercial Laundry Machines
brands.description: We supply and execute fully equipped laundry setups using international-standard machines from leading OEMs.

brands.name: Laundry Layout Planning & Execution
brands.description: Aadi Enterprises provides end-to-end execution for hotel laundries: Layout planning, Equipment sizing, Installation & commissioning, 3D workflow optimization, Maintenance & AMC. This ensures smoother operation, reduced labor effort, and consistent hygiene.

brands.name: Laundry Accessories
brands.description: Compatible with all leading machine brands.

brands.name: Electrolux Professional
brands.headline: The Gold Standard in Laundry Engineering
brands.description: Electrolux is globally recognized as the #1 premium laundry equipment manufacturer, offering unmatched energy efficiency and long-term performance.
features: Lowest water & energy consumption in the industry

brands.name: Elanpro
brands.headline: The Commercial Refrigeration Experts
brands.description: Elanpro is one of India's most trusted names in hotel refrigeration, offering high-performance minibars designed for silent operation, energy efficiency, and modern guest rooms.

brands.name: JVD
brands.headline: French Hospitality Essentials for Modern Hotels
brands.description: JVD is a French brand known worldwide for premium hotel amenities, hygiene fixtures, and in-room comfort products. Its design, durability, and elegant aesthetics make it a preferred choice of luxury hotels across the globe.
features: Premium finish options for modern interiors

productCategories.title: Leather Products
productCategories.description: Premium Leather Products for Hotels & Hospitality.

brands.name: Luxury Leather Collection
brands.headline: Upgrade your guest experience with our premium leather products.
brands.description: Designed exclusively for hotels, resorts, and hospitality facilities. From elegant in-room accessories to durable back-of-house operational bags, every item is crafted with precision, durability, and a modern luxury aesthetic.

subItems.title: Luxury Leather Room Accessories
subItems.description: Enhance every guest room with high-quality leather accessories.

subItems.title: Front Office & Concierge Leather Accessories
subItems.description: Make a powerful first impression with luxury leather products.

features: Premium finishes suited for luxury and boutique hotels

Customization Options: Gold, silver, or rose-gold foil stamping
Multiple leather options: Genuine, Vegan, PU
